alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Howard; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 3:22PM CDT until May 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR EASTERN GREELEY...NANCE...NORTHERN MERRICK AND EASTERN HOWARD COUNTIES... At 321 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Petersburg to 6 miles south of Albion to 8 miles southwest of Belgrade to near Archer to near Chapman, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Fullerton and Belgrade around 330 PM CDT. Genoa around 355 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
